item.description:
Are you ready for a funny good time? People have been asking about comedy shows, dinners, etc. We've rolled all these into this one event. At Gene's Corner House in Plantsville, CT (Southington) on March 30th.

A social gathering, dinner and a comedy show all in one location.

Comedians include Darren Norton, Rick Carino, Chris Symington & Vincent McEthone.

Doors open at 6pm, Dinner at 7pm, Show begins at 8.30 pm.

Tickets for the show only are $15 or $35 for an all you can eat family style dinner and show.

We need to make reservations ahead of time and will need to know by March 20, 2007 if you're interested in attending.

Link to Rick Carino's comedy page: Rick Carino's homepage

Link to Gene's: Gene's Corner Restaurant

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: A funny good time - comedy show and dinner
